description: Iterates over a list of Data objects, outputting one item at a time and aggregating results from loop inputs.

data.info: The initial list of Data objects or DataFrame to iterate over.

warnings.index_out_of_range: Index {index} out of range, returning empty Data

errors.invalid_data_type: The 'data' input must be a DataFrame, a list of Data objects, or a single Data object.

logs.converting_dataframe: Converting DataFrame to list of Data objects
logs.wrapping_single_data: Wrapping single Data object in list
logs.data_list_valid: Data list is valid with {count} items
logs.evaluating_stop: Evaluating stop condition - Current index: {current_index}, Data length: {data_length}, Should stop: {should_stop}
logs.loop_completed: Loop iteration completed - stopping item output
logs.done_output: Done output triggered with {count} aggregated items
logs.loop_not_done: Loop not done yet - stopping done output
logs.loop_variables: Retrieved loop variables - Data count: {data_count}, Current index: {current_index}
